findings.title: Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract does not allow non-excluded addresses to transfer tokens.

findings.title: Redundant Conditional Statement
findings.description: The variable `tokenLiquidityThreshold` is always greater than 1, making the conditional statement redundant.

findings.title: Potential Transfer Revert Propagation
findings.description: The contract sends funds to a `marketingWallet` and a `devWallet` which can revert from incoming payment.

findings.title: Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables are not defined as immutable, which can be optimized for gas efficiency.

findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming convention guidelines.

findings.title: Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Events are not properly triggered and logged.

findings.title: Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: The order of operations can affect the final result of calculations.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Using uninitialized local variables can lead to unpredictable behavior.

findings.title: Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The `^` symbol indicates that any version of Solidity compatible with the specified version can be used to compile the contract.

findings.title: Succeeded Transfer Check
findings.description: The transfer methods should be checked if the result is successful.
